originalText.text: Finding the best home care service for my grandmother  was a top priority for our family and we definitely made the right choice with the agency we selected. The home attendants were knowledgeable and caring, and they really went above and beyond to make sure my grandmother was comfortable and safe.

text.text: Finding the best home care service for my grandmother  was a top priority for our family and we definitely made the right choice with the agency we selected. The home attendants were knowledgeable and caring, and they really went above and beyond to make sure my grandmother was comfortable and safe.

originalText.text: We loved physical therapists! They were super positive and friendly! They were also fantastic with my grandmother, who hated to exercise. They clearly explained everything, gave us time to ask questions, and were very accommodating with scheduling. This agency provides the best home health care  services near me!

text.text: We loved physical therapists! They were super positive and friendly! They were also fantastic with my grandmother, who hated to exercise. They clearly explained everything, gave us time to ask questions, and were very accommodating with scheduling. This agency provides the best home health care  services near me!

originalText.text: In Home Physical Therapy NYC assisted our family with every aspect of home care for our sick dad, including pain medication, music therapy, massage therapy, social worker visits, and simply being a listening ear. They anticipated what was needed and made excellent recommendations. They were  fantastic, and I would definitely recommend them.

originalText.text: My grandfather died last week, and my family is eternally grateful for the care and comfort he received in his last days. In Home Physical Therapy NYC not only looks after the patients, but also the entire family. Thank you for all you do; you  are a treasure to us.
